title: Landing Page Localization and Content Display
description: Verify that the Landing Page loads correctly with all localized Nigerian content, including Nigerian English text, pricing displayed in Nigerian Naira (₦), testimonials, and team information.

steps.description: Navigate to the Landing Page
Check all text content is in Nigerian English and culturally localized
Verify pricing is displayed correctly in Nigerian Naira (₦)
Verify testimonials section is present with expected testimonial content
Verify team section is present with accurate team member details

title: Pricing Page Tier Details and CTAs
description: Ensure the Pricing Page displays correct tier-based plans (Starter, Pro, Business) with accurate Nigerian Naira (₦) prices and functional call-to-action buttons.

steps.description: Navigate to the Pricing Page
Verify Starter plan is listed at ₦40,000/mo with correct feature list
Verify Pro plan is listed at ₦95,000/mo with correct feature list
Verify Business plan is listed at ₦220,000/mo with correct feature list
Check FAQs section is present and displays relevant information
Test that CTAs (e.g., subscribe or contact buttons) are clickable and initiate the expected workflow

title: Demo Page Interactive Voice Receptionist
description: Test interactive demo page functionality, verifying voice-based AI receptionist interactions including voice input, AI processing, and audio response playback.

steps.description: Navigate to the Demo Page
Initiate voice interaction via microphone input
Verify real-time transcription text appears within 500 ms of spoken input
Confirm AI responses are generated accurately using Groq LLM with natural conversation flow
Validate MiniMax TTS converts responses to clear Nigerian English speech without lag
Verify voice activity detection accurately detects speech start and stop events, minimizing false positives

title: Contact and Trial Signup Form Submission
description: Validate the Contact and Trial Signup form captures business and industry information correctly, and the direct WhatsApp link functions properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact and Trial Signup Page
Fill out all required fields with valid business and industry information
Submit the form
Check that submission is successful and confirmation is shown
Click the WhatsApp direct link
Verify the WhatsApp link opens in a new tab/window and initiates correct contact

title: Voice Streaming Orchestrator Integration Flow
description: Test the end-to-end real-time voice streaming orchestration among Deepgram STT, Groq LLM, and MiniMax TTS, ensuring ultra-low latency and accurate audio processing.

steps.description: Start voice streaming through the orchestrator with live input
Confirm user audio is streamed with latency under 500 milliseconds to Deepgram STT
Validate Deepgram STT transcribes speech to text accurately in real-time
Check transcription text is sent to Groq LLM for processing and lead qualification
Verify Groq LLM generates intelligent conversational responses
Ensure responses are sent to MiniMax TTS and converted to natural Nigerian English speech
Confirm synthesized speech is played back with minimal delay, completing the loop

title: Voice Activity Detection Accuracy
description: Verify that Voice Activity Detection (VAD) correctly and promptly detects when the user starts and stops speaking with minimal false positives or missed speech segments.

steps.description: Start voice input and speak multiple phrases with natural pauses
Validate that VAD detects speech start events immediately as user begins speaking
Validate that VAD detects speech stop events immediately after user finishes speaking
Remain silent and observe if VAD produces false positives
Verify no false positives occur during silence or ambient noise

title: Audio Visualizer Synchronization
description: Test that the real-time Audio Visualizer displays accurate and synchronized waveform feedback for both user voice input and AI synthesized output.

steps.description: Initiate a voice conversation with the AI receptionist
Verify waveform visualization responds dynamically and reflects user voice amplitude and timing
Verify waveform visualization also animates in sync with AI-generated speech playback
Introduce variable speech volumes and pauses
Check the visualizer accurately reflects changes in input volume and pauses

title: Chat Widget Functionality and Integration
description: Verify that the embeddable Chat Widget works properly with knowledge base queries, maintains message history, shows typing indicators, and integrates with voice streaming smoothly.

steps.description: Embed the Chat Widget on a webpage and open it
Send text query to Chat Widget and verify knowledge base responses
Confirm that query responses are relevant and accurate per knowledge base
Send additional messages and verify that message history is retained and displayed
Check that typing indicators appear correctly when AI is preparing a response
Initiate voice streaming interaction within the widget
Verify voice streaming works end-to-end with synchronized transcription and audio playback inside the widget

title: Configuration Management Security and Environment Setup
description: Ensure centralized Configuration Management securely stores API keys and environment-specific settings without exposure, and supports parameter customization.

steps.description: Inspect configuration files and environment variables setup
Check that API keys are not present in public repositories or frontend code
Confirm .gitignore includes sensitive config files
Attempt to modify model settings and VAD parameters in the config
Verify changes take effect without error and do not expose sensitive information

title: SEO Optimization Verification
description: Validate that SEO elements such as meta tags, Open Graph data, Twitter Cards, structured schema.org data, sitemap.xml, and robots.txt are properly implemented targeting the Nigerian market.

steps.description: Access the source code of all public-facing pages (Landing, Pricing, Demo, Contact)
Verify presence and correctness of meta tags relevant to Nigerian audience
Check that Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata exist and are well-formed
Confirm schema.org structured data is included and valid
Fetch sitemap.xml and verify URL listings correspond to public pages
Fetch robots.txt and ensure proper rules are applied

title: Security Headers and Deployment Configuration
description: Verify security configuration is applied properly through deployment settings including API key management, .gitignore usage, and security headers in Vercel deployment.

steps.description: Review vercel.json and SECURITY.md for security header rules and deployment best practices
Verify security headers are served with all public pages (e.g., Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options)
Check that API keys are injected only at server or environment level, not exposed on client
Attempt to access config files excluded by .gitignore via public URL
Confirm that sensitive configuration files are not accessible

title: MiniMax TTS Testing Interface Validation
description: Validate the TTS Testing Interface produces natural, intelligible Nigerian English speech outputs for diverse text inputs and voice settings without errors.

steps.description: Open the TTS Testing Interface
Input a variety of text samples including short phrases, long sentences, and colloquial Nigerian English
Use different voice settings and submit for synthesis
Confirm TTS outputs clear, natural-sounding Nigerian English speech each time
Verify no synthesis errors occur and audio playback is smooth

title: Error Handling for Speech Recognition Failures
description: Test system behavior when Deepgram STT fails or delivers errors, verifying graceful error handling and user notification.

steps.description: Simulate Deepgram STT WebSocket disconnection or API error during voice input
Verify system detects failure and notifies user with understandable error message
Check that system attempts automatic retry or fallbacks smoothly
Confirm no unhandled exceptions or crashes happen

title: Edge Case: Handling No Speech Input
description: Verify system response when user activates voice input but does not speak or the audio input is silent.

steps.description: Start voice interaction and remain silent for a set period
Verify voice activity detection correctly identifies no speech
Check that the system does not send unnecessary requests to STT or LLM
Verify user receives prompt or guidance after timeout requesting them to speak

title: Performance under High Load
description: Test system stability, latency, and accuracy under simulated high user load and concurrent voice interactions.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users using voice interactions via the Demo Page or API
Monitor latency of speech-to-text, LLM response, and text-to-speech processing is under defined thresholds
Verify no request timeouts, failures, or inaccurate transcriptions/responses occur due to load
Check server and client memory/cpu usage remains within safe limits
